title: Ep. 26 - Fundamentals
description:
On today's show, the guys draw some battle lines as they are in the middle of bulking season for the upcoming weight loss challenge. They also discuss experts claiming Alexa will be able to predict whether couples will stay together with 75% accuracy by 2021, Starbucks announcing that they are going to block customers from accessing porn on their free wifi, and chat about Nigeria's president potentially being an actual clone of himself after disappearing for over three months. Todd wants to know what cereals the guys would create for each other, they play some fact or fiction, answer some listener questions including what mythical creatures they'd choose to protect them, and do a deep dive into what some of their most underrated movies are. To close out the show, the guys head into their phones for some vitamin thoughts. It's a fun one, come join us.

This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy, and ends with a jam by the boss, Bruce Springsteen.
dc:creator: The Pod
